alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 29 at 5:03PM CDT until April 29 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Valley County in central Nebraska... Sherman County in central Nebraska... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 503 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Taylor to near Arcadia to 7 miles south of Mason City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Arcadia around 510 PM CDT. Litchfield around 515 PM CDT. Hazard around 520 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Loup City, Elyria, Fort Hartsuff State Park, Ord, Sherman Reservoir Dam, Ashton and Rockville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
